name: Swing Dash
description:
Swing your way through 3 different level types as you search for the hidden temple and the treasure within!

Made in 9 days for Godot Wild Jam 21

Theme: Connection / Wildcard: Speedrunning

Controls:

  • A/D : Move
  • Space : Jump
  • Left/Right Mouse : Connect to tether point / Make connected tether solid/unsolid
  • CTRL+(Left/Right) Mouse : Disconnect connected tether
  • E : Interact with levers

Game making process streamed over on https://www.twitch.tv/johnnyhotshot

Making-of Video: Coming Soon!

Downloadable Windows version available if web version has problems
